.breadcrumbs
{
    padding: 1.5em 0;
}
.home .site-header
{
    background-color: transparent;
}
.home .site-header.minimal
{
    background-color: #f1f1f1;
}
.home .site-header.minimal .call-to-action a.home-link
{
    display: none;
}
.home .site-header .lower-header:before
{
    background:    -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,.50) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,rgba(0,0,0,.50)), color-stop(100%,rgba(0,0,0,0))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,.50) 0%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
    background:      -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,.50) 0%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
    background:     -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,0,0,.50) 0%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* IE10+ */
    background:         linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,0,.50) 0%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%); /* W3C */

    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#a6000000', endColorstr='#00000000',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
}
.home .main-navigation a
{
    color: #fff;
}
.call-to-action
{
    padding: 0;
}
.call-us
{
    width: 25%;

    text-align: left;
}
.site-header.minimal .call-us
{
    width: 30%;
    padding-top: 25px;
    padding-left: 10px;
}
.minimal .menu-header-cta-menu-container
{
    padding-top: 25px;
}

.call-to-action .menu-header-cta-menu-container a
{
    font-size: 14px;

    padding: 10px 18px 10px 10px;

    border: none;
}
.site-header .menu-header-cta-menu-container a svg
{
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
}
.menu-header-cta-menu-container a svg
{
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: 0;

    margin-top: -7px;
}
.menu-header-cta-menu-container li
{
    margin-left: 25px;
}
.menu-header-cta-menu-container li:first-of-type
{
    margin-left: 0;
}

.home .site-branding
{
    position: relative;

    float: left;
}
.home .header-logo
{
    width: 228px;
    height: 27px;

    background: url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/sprites/logo_white.png) 0 0/100% no-repeat !important;
}

{
    padding: 1.5em 0;
}
.breadcrumbs .font-size-16-inline
{
    font-size: 16px;

    display: inline;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block
{
    padding: 0 15px;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block:nth-child(3n+1)
{
    clear: none;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block a
{
    position: relative;

    display: block;

    background: #fafafa;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block a::before
{
    display: block;

    padding-top: 100%;

    content: '';
}

.blog-posts .grid-block .post-meta
{
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 3;
    top: 20px;
    right: 0;
    left: 0;

    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 20px;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block .post-meta h1
{
    font-size: 2rem;
    line-height: 1.2;

    margin: 0 0 1rem;

    color: #fff;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block .post-meta p
{
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.2;

    margin: 0;

    color: #fff;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block .post-meta.charcoal h1,
.blog-posts .grid-block .post-meta.charcoal p
{
    color: #4c4d4f;
}
.blog-posts .grid-block img
{
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 1;
    top: 50%;
    left: 0;

    width: 100%;
    height: auto;

    -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);
        -ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
            transform: translateY(-50%);
}
.filtered-post a
{
    text-decoration: none;
}
.filtered-post-meta
{
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 3;
    top: 20px;
    right: 0;
    left: 0;

    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 35px;
}
.filtered-post-meta h2
{
    font-size: 2rem;
    line-height: 1.2;

    margin: 0 0 1rem;

    text-decoration: none;

    color: #4c4d4f;
    border-bottom: none !important;
}
.filtered-post-meta p
{
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.2;

    margin: 0;

    color: #4c4d4f;
}
.related-posts-box
{
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    padding-bottom: 30px;

    border-bottom: 2px solid #eaeaea;
}
.related-posts-box h3
{
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}
.related-posts-box .row
{
    margin-right: -15px;
    margin-left: -15px;
}
.related-post-item
{
    position: relative;

    display: block;
}
.related-post-item img
{
    width: 100%;

    vertical-align: top;
}

.related-post-meta
{
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    top: 20px;
    right: 20px;
    left: 0;

    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 20px;
}
.related-post-meta h4
{
    font-size: 22px;
    line-height: 1.2;

    z-index: 2;

    margin: 0 0 1rem 0;

    color: #fff;
}
.related-post-meta p
{
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.2;

    margin: 0;

    color: #fff;
}
.related-post-meta.charcoal h4,
.related-post-meta.charcoal p
{
    color: #4c4d4f;
}

.office-wrapper .location-post
{
    clear: both;
    overflow: hidden;

    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.office-wrapper h2
{
    margin-top: 0 !important;
}
.case-studies .filtered-post
{
    overflow: hidden;

    text-align: center;
}
.case-studies .filtered-post-meta
{
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 3;
    top: 45%;
    right: 0;
    left: 50%;

    width: 80%;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0 35px;

    -webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -45%);
            transform: translate(-50%, -45%);
}
.case-studies .filtered-post-meta h2
{
    font-family: brown, sans-serif;
    font-size: 2.7rem;
    font-weight: normal;
}
.case-studies .filtered-post a
{
    display: block;

    color: #4c4d4f;
}
.case-studies .filtered-post img
{
    min-height: 1px;
}

        background: url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/sprites/logo.png) 0 0/100% no-repeat !important;
    }


    .menu-header-cta-menu-container li
    {
        display: block;
        float: none;
    }

    .breadcrumbs h1
    {
        font-size: 2.2rem !important;
    }
    .single-slide
    {
        height: 320px;
    }
    .video-text
    {
        text-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0, .5);
    }

    .single-slide-1
    {
        background: #000 url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/v-screen/scene_1_globe.jpg) 50% 50% / cover no-repeat;
    }
    .single-slide-2
    {
        background: #000 url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/v-screen/scene_2_coffee.jpg) 50% 50% / cover no-repeat;
    }
    .single-slide-3
    {
        background: #000 url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/v-screen/scene_3_clock.jpg) 50% 50% / cover no-repeat;
    }
    .single-slide-4
    {
        background: #000 url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/v-screen/scene_4_sofa.jpg) 50% 50% / cover no-repeat;
    }
    .single-slide-5
    {
        background: #000 url(https://d1bile9su2eskg.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/meltwater/images/v-screen/scene_5_balloon.jpg) 50% 50% / cover no-repeat;
    }
    .stories-list video
    {
        visibility: hidden;
    }
    .stories-list .owl-buttons
    {
        display: none;
    }

    .call-us
    {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        line-height: 1.2;

        width: 100%;
        padding: 0;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .call-us a
    {
        display: inline;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container
    {
        width: 100%;
    }
    .home-link
    {
        height: 70px;
    }
    .minimal .call-to-action
    {
        display: none;

        background-size: 140px auto;
    }
    .minimal .call-to-action .call-us
    {
        display: none;
    }
    .minimal .lower-header
    {
        /*display: block;*/
    }
    #menu-header-cta-menu
    {
        text-align: center;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu-item
    {
        display: inline-block;

        width: auto;
        margin: 0 10px 0 0;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu-item a
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;

        padding: 2px;

        color: #4c4d4f;
        border: none;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu-item svg
    {
        display: none;
    }

    .testimonials .quote p
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
    }

    .stories-list .owl-prev
    {
        left: 0;
    }
    .stories-list .owl-next
    {
        right: 0;
    }
    .stories-list .owl-buttons > div
    {
        width: 30px;
    }
    .stories-list .video-text
    {
        top: 60px;
    }
    .stories-list h2
    {
        font-size: 2rem;
    }
    .stories-list h3
    {
        font-size: 1.5rem;

        display: none !important;
    }

    .philosophy h2
    {
        float: none;

        width: 100%;
        margin: 0 0 2rem 0;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .philosophy .philosophy-block.philosophy-left
    {
        display: none;
    }
    .philosophy .philosophy-block
    {
        float: none;

        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
    }
    .philosophy .intro-text p
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
    }

    .products .product
    {
        display: table !important; /* reorder DOM nodes on mobile */

        width: 96%;
        margin: 0 2% 15px 2%;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .product-text-wrapper
    {
        display: table-footer-group; /* reorder DOM nodes on mobile */
    }
    .product img.icon
    {
        display: table-header-group; /* reorder DOM nodes on mobile */

        margin-top: 20px;
    }
    .layout-section
    {
        padding: 20px 15px;
    }
    .layout-section h1
    {
        margin: 10px 0;
        padding: 10px 0;
    }

    section.insights
    {
        padding-bottom: 100px;

        background-position: 98% 100%;
        background-size: 100px auto;
    }
    section.insights .insights-wrap
    {
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0 15px;
    }
    section.insights p
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
    }

    .footer-widgets
    {
        width: 50% !important;
        margin: 30px 0 !important;
        padding: 0  15px !important;
    }
    .footer-widgets:nth-of-type(2)::after
    {
        position: relative;

        display: block;

        width: 100%;
        height: 1px;

        content: '';
    }

    /*****************************
        PRODUCTS PAGE
    *****************************/
    .filter-terms
    {
        height: 90px;
        padding-top: 4px;
    }
    .filtered-posts .features-post
    {
        width: 50%;
    }

    .filtered-content h2,
    section.features h2
    {
        font-size: 2rem;
    }
    .filtered-posts .features-post
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
        line-height: 1.2;
    }

    .blog-posts .entry-title,
    .featured-blog-post .entry-title
    {
        font-size: 2rem;
    }
    .features-post h3
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
        line-height: 1.2;

        height: auto;
    }

    /*****************************
    PRODUCTS PAGE
    *****************************/
    .page-header
    {
        padding-right: 15px;
        padding-left: 15px;
    }
    .page-header .page-title
    {
        font-size: 3.2rem;
    }
    .entry-title
    {
        font-size: 3.2rem;
        line-height: 1.2;
    }
    .entry-content h1
    {
        font-size: 3rem;
        line-height: 1.2;
    }
    .entry-content h3
    {
        font-size: 1.6rem;
        line-height: 1.2;
    }
    .entry-content p,
    .entry-content ul li,
    .entry-content ol li
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
    }
    .title-description h2
    {
        font-size: 1.8rem;
    }
    .wp-caption-text
    {
        font-size: 1.3rem;
    }
    .entry-content .mktoForm .mktoFormRow,
    .entry-content .mktoForm .mktoButtonRow
    {
        float: none;

        width: 100%;
    }
    .entry-content .mktoForm .mktoButtonRow
    {
        margin-right: 0;
        margin-left: 0;
        padding-top: 30px;
    }
    .entry-content .mktoForm .mktoButtonRow .mktoSkip
    {
        margin-left: 0 !important;
    }
    .entry-content .mktoForm .mktoButtonWrap.mktoSkip .mktoButton
    {
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }
    .nav-links
    {
        padding-right: 15px;
        padding-left: 15px;
    }
    .page-numbers
    {
        margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
    .page-numbers.next,
    .page-numbers.prev
    {
        line-height: 30px;

        display: block;

        max-width: 120px;
        height: 30px;
        margin: 20px auto;
        padding: 0;
    }
    .page-numbers.next
    {
        margin-top: 10px;
    }
    .search-field
    {
        width: 100%;
    }
    .comments-area
    {
        padding-right: 15px;
        padding-left: 15px;
    }
    .widget-area
    {
        padding-right: 15px;
        padding-left: 15px;
    }
    .site-main .post-navigation
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;

        padding: 40px 15px 0 15px;
    }
    .multi-column .column-wrap[data-column-count='4'] .column
    {
        width: 48% !important;
        margin: 0 1% !important;
    }

    .multi-column .column h2
    {
        font-size: 1.6rem;

        height: auto;
    }
    .multi-column p
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
        line-height: 1.4;
    }
    .multi-column p a.button
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem !important;
        line-height: 40px !important;

        height: 40px !important;
        padding: 0 1em !important;

        white-space: nowrap;
    }
    .filtered-posts .filtered-post
    {
        width: 100%;
    }
    .filtered-posts img
    {
        display: block;

        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        min-height: auto !important;
        margin-right: auto;
        margin-left: auto;
    }
    .blog-posts .grid-block
    {
        width: 100%;
        margin-right: 0;
        margin-left: 0;
        padding: 0 10px;
    }
    .blog-posts .grid-block img
    {
        width: 100%;
    }
    .embed-wrap .mktoFormRow
    {
        display: block;

        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .embed-wrap .mktoFormRow label
    {
        display: block;

        text-align: left;
    }
    .embed-wrap input,
    .embed-wrap select,
    .embed-wrap textarea
    {
        width: 100% !important;
        max-width: 100% !important;
    }
    .embed-wrap textarea
    {
        height: 160px !important;
    }
    .embed-wrap #primary form button,
    .embed-wrap .mktoButtonRow,
    .embed-wrap .mktoButtonWrap,
    .embed-wrap .mktoForm .mktoButtonWrap.mktoSimple .mktoButton,
    .embed-wrap button
    {
        width: 100% !important;
    }
    .mktoForm .mktoButtonWrap.mktoSkip button.mktoButton
    {
        font: 14px !important;
    }
    .page-template-default .layout-section,
    .page-template-default .entry-content p
    {
        font-size: 14px;
    }
    .page-template-default .entry-content h2
    {
        font-size: 20px;
    }
    /* our offices page */
    .office-wrapper .filtered-post::after
    {
        display: none;
    }
    .office-wrapper .filtered-post
    {
        overflow: hidden;

        width: 100%;

        border-bottom: 6px solid #eaeaea;
    }
    .office-wrapper .office
    {
        float: none;

        width: 100%;
    }
    .office-wrapper .map-location
    {
        float: none;

        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        margin-top: 15px;
        padding: 15px;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .office-wrapper .map-location img
    {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }
    .login_inner input
    {
        display: block;

        width: 100%;
    }
    .login_inner input[type='submit']
    {
        height: 40px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 479px)
{
    .single-slide
    {
        height: 280px;
    }
    .connect .fa-icon,
    .share .fa-icon
    {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
    }
    .breadcrumbs
    {
        /*padding-top: 40px;*/
    }
    .multi-column .column-wrap[data-column-count='3'] .column
    {
        width: 98% !important;
        margin: 0 1% !important;
    }
    .header-buttons .button
    {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 20px;

        min-height: 10px;
        margin-left: 0;
        padding: 4px 6px;

        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
    }
    .header-buttons .button::before
    {
        font-size: 16px;

        position: relative;
        top: 0;

        margin-right: 4px;
    }
    .header-buttons .button svg
    {
        display: none;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu-item
    {
        width: 32%;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu li:last-of-type
    {
        width: 30%;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu li a
    {
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 1.4 !important;

        padding: 0;
    }
    .menu-header-cta-menu-container .menu li a svg
    {
        display: none;
    }
    .page-header .page-title
    {
        font-size: 2.4rem;
    }
    .layout-section h5,
    .entry-content h5
    {
        font-size: 1.6rem;
    }

    img.alignright,
    img.alignleft
    {
        display: block;
        float: none;

        max-width: 100%;
        margin-right: auto;
        margin-left: auto;
    }
}

.clearfix:before,
.clearfix:after,
.container:before,
.container:after,
.container-fluid:before,
.container-fluid:after,
.row:before,
.row:after
{
    display: table;

    content: ' ';
}
.clearfix:after,
.container:after,
.container-fluid:after,
.row:after
{
    clear: both;
}

/* management team grid */
.entry-content .mw-container-fluid
{
    padding-right: 0;
    padding-left: 0;
}
.entry-content .mw-container-fluid .row
{
    margin-right: -15px;
    margin-left: -15px;
}
.mw-container-fluid.team-grid img
{
    width: auto;
    max-height: 250px;
}
.team-grid div[class^='col-']
{
    font-size: 16px;

    min-height: 400px;
}
.team-member-name
{
    display: block;
    clear: both;

    padding-top: 20px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px)
{
    .team-grid div[class^='col-']
    {
        width: 100%;
        min-height: 10px;

        text-align: center;
    }
    img.team_member
    {
        float: none;
    }
}
.text-center
{
    text-align: center;
}

.mw-container-fluid h2
{
    font-size: 2.4rem !important;

    padding-top: 40px;
}
.mw-container-fluid h4
{
    font-size: 2rem;

    padding-top: 20px;
}
/* authors block */
.author-info-box
{
    position: relative;

    min-height: 210px;
    padding: 30px 15px 30px 170px;

    border-top: 6px solid #28bbbb;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #eaeaea;
}
.author-info-box.author-top-box
{
    margin-bottom: 30px;

    border-top: none;
}
.author-info-box .avatar
{
    position: absolute;
    top: 30px;
    left: 0;

    width: 140px;
}
.author-info-name
{
    clear: none;

    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.author-info-social
{
    /*    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-bottom: 20px;*/
}
.author-info-social + .post
{
    clear: both;
}
.author-info-social a
{
    font-size: 2.4rem;

    display: inline-block;

    margin-right: 10px;

    vertical-align: middle;
}
.author-info-social a:last-of-type
{
    margin-right: 0;
}
.author-info-date
{
    font-size: 14px;

    margin: 0;

    color: #949494;
}
.author-info-desc
{
    font-size: 16px;
}
.author-info-desc:last-of-type
{
    margin-bottom: 0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 992px)
{
    .author-info-box .avatar
    {
        left: 15px;
    }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px)
{
    .author-info-box
    {
        padding: 20px 15px;
    }
    .author-info-box .avatar
    {
        position: relative;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;

        display: block;
        float: none;

        max-width: 100%;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }
    .author-info-name
    {
        font-size: 2.4rem;

        float: none;
        clear: both;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .author-info-social
    {
        float: none;

        margin: 0;
        padding: 10px;

        text-align: center;
    }
    .author-info-desc
    {
        font-size: 1.4rem;
    }
    .mw-container-fluid .col-xs-12 img
    {
        max-width: 140px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 992px)
{
    .related-posts-box .row
    {
        margin-right: 0;
        margin-left: 0;
    }
    .related-post-item
    {
        margin-bottom: 15px;
    }
    .related-posts-box h3
    {
        padding-right: 15px;
        padding-left: 15px;
    }
}


/* fix multiple select */
.entry-content .mktoForm select.mktoField[multiple]
{
    height: auto;

    background-image: none;
}
#Usecaseforsoftware
{
    min-height: 160px;
}

/* Privacy table adaptive styles */
.table-cookies
{
    width: 100%;
}
.table-cookies th,
.table-cookies td
{
    padding: 10px;

    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px)
{
    .table-cookies
    {
        border-collapse: separate;
    }
    .table-cookies th
    {
        display: none;
    }
    .table-cookies td
    {
        font-size: 14px;

        position: relative;

        display: block;

        padding-left: 90px;

        border-bottom: none;
    }
    .table-cookies td:before
    {
        font-weight: bold;

        position: absolute;
        top: 10px;
        left: 0;

        display: block;
        /*width: 6.5em;*/

        width: 80px;

        content: attr(data-th) ': ';
        text-align: right;
    }
    .table-cookies tr:first-of-type td:first-of-type
    {
        border-top: 1px solid #ccc;
    }
    .table-cookies tr td:last-of-type
    {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
    }
}


@media screen and (max-width: 479px)
{
    .home .stories-list
    {
        padding-top: 78px !important;
    }
}
    </style>
